dataList.dlg: ขานตอบฉันที อุดมคติของคุณเป็นแบบใด
ทลายกรงนกนี้
แล้วจงเป็นอิสระ
ฉันจะเผา ในสิ่งที่อยากเผาเท่านั้น
ทุกอย่าง… จะเหลือเพียงธุลี
If it is fortune you seek—pray with all sincerity.
Speak unto me your wish… Vocalize your eagerness…
Such enchanting colors… The path is intent on thwarting all attempts to memorize it.
As a matter of fact, the alley is an open one.
I worry that this seeping rain may leak through the umbrella.
The air is too cold... and raindrops only grow thicker.
This is a portrait of theirs. Will you observe... a little closer?
Leave at once, interloper! Leave this place...!

I shall feel the ponderous mass of the gun barrel rest upon my viscera.
Let this accursed bullet pierce through them...!
There is neither; no fragments of memories, no need to look into them... fire, only fire!
There is neither; no fragments of memories, no need to look into them... fire, only fire!
